sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import {Container, Card, Col, Row, Button, Stack} from 'react-bootstrap' import { EditStudent } from './EditStudent' const StudentCard = (props) => { const {student} = props const {id, firstname, lastname,address, dob, email, mobile, course} = student const {institute} = course const handleDeleteStudent=(id)=>{ return props.deleteStudent(id) } return ( {firstname} {lastname} Date Of Birth: {dob.substring(0,10)} Email : {email} Contact: {mobile} Address: {address} Course: {course.name} Institute: {institute.name} ) } export default StudentCard
